```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
source(here("./scripts/TAMASA_lhc.R"))
```




```{r}
path_tables <- "./docs/tables/"
l_md <- list.files(path_tables) %>%
  map(~ read_csv(here(path_tables, .)))

l_md <- list.files(path_tables) %>%
  str_extract(".*(?=_recap_tab.csv)") %>%
  set_names(l_md, nm = .)

md <- bind_rows(l_md, .id = "part")

vars_glb <- TAMASA_prepare_lhc() 
vars_nms <- str_remove(vars_glb$param, "(?<=tlab_[a-z]_[a-z]{2})_[a-z]{3}")

md %>% 
  filter(Variable %in% vars_nms) %>%
  knitr::kable()
```
